metadata.description: Rules for changes between Camel 3.1 and Camel 3.2

hint.title: org.apache.camel.impl.JndiRegistry has been removed
hint.message: `org.apache.camel.impl.JndiRegistry` has been removed - please use org.apache.camel.support.jndi.JndiBeanRepository in org.apache.camel:camel-support instead.

link.title: Camel 3 - Migration Guide: Spring Boot Starters

hint.title: camel-spark-rest has been removed
hint.message: camel-spark-rest component has been removed - please any of the other REST capable components, such as camel-jetty, camel-netty-http or camel-undertow..

hint.title: Camel Spring Boot has flattened its option keys and the .configuration prefix has been removed
hint.message: Camel Spring Boot has flattened its option keys and the .configuration prefix has been removed. See the example in the upgrade guide for 3.2 for more details

link.title: Camel 3 - Migration Guide: Spring Boot configuration

hint.title: broker-u-r-l in Spring Boot properties renamed to broker-url
hint.message: broker-u-r-l in Spring Boot properties renamed to broker-url. See the example in the upgrade guide for 3.2 for more details
